ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Bards and Pulling (and a few other comments)
ygData.msgSnippet: I, uh...accidentlally ran past V...someone, in Firona, the high level necro, the other day.  I never even saw him.  Suddenly, I see a dot on me.  Ok, no
ygData.messageBody:
I, uh...accidentlally ran past V...someone, in Firona, the high level necro,
the other day. I never even saw him. Suddenly, I see a dot on me. Ok, no
problem. This happened near the big statue at the waterfall just outside
the outpost, so I ran just a little ways back towards the outpost, figure
I'm near enough the pilgrims and butterfly things (heh...forget name), and I
start hymn. Look at health bar. Equip lute. Look at health bar. Panic.
Sit. Watch health bar dwindle to nothing. Die. Was funny, in it's own
little way. I was sitting, talking in guildchat about this particular necro
(not very flattering), necros in general, and dots, and wondering if a 29
bard can live through a 50-odd level necro dot....right up until I died.

I've become very aware of my surroundings now when travelling from FV to
LOIO. :P

Atonal

-----Original Message-----
From: blitz_krieg@... [mailto:blitz_krieg@...]
Sent: Tuesday, February 27, 2001 12:37 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Re: Bards and Pulling (and a few other comments)



> and there's no way for the casters to nail you down unless you let
them.

Unless you're one of the .28% of EQ players who plays a Bard on PVP
and your group member roots ya. :)

with the subject submissions.
